summary: faster generation of xsd for sid
description: today the generation of the xsd for sid is taking a very long time due to model closure
as the sid is self contained except for the common model a way to generate faster the sid by not doing model closure might be nice
some users of josif use a proxy configuration to acces internet
some elements are well managed with the maven proxy configuration
other cases for example when a generator or uses external url uses of external xsds it cannot be accessed because of a missconfiguration problem in its context
it is needed to include a context with proxy definition
